title: [娱乐]Outfits ——一款不错的装饰插件[自带新版虚拟币`] [1.8-1.9]
author: kanming
txt_content: 本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 20:47 编辑 前提要求：JAVA8 Outfits——服装插件 ==================================== 这款插件的特点： 1：他拥有一个GUI面板，让你快速操作 2：里面自带了一种货币来购买物品【名字为：coins】 3：也可以使用权限和命令 还有其他的玩法哟 ==================================== /of help 查看帮助 命令                                权限                                用处： /of gui 无权限 打开GUI面板 /of reload outfit.reload 重新加载插件 /of add ID 数量outfit.admin 为某个玩家增加XX货币 /of remove outfit.remove 删掉当前你在穿的服装 /of coins 无权限 查看自己的游戏币 /outfitvillager 布吉岛[大神指一下] 权限： outfit.head.头颅名字[给玩家在面板的使用权限] ==================================== 配置： 配置1： 个人认为没有什么用的.....自行研究啦，啦啦啦啦啦啦啦#……￥#……￥……￥&……%……￥&……*& ############################################################## # +--------------------------------------------------------+ # # |                        Outfit                          | # # +                      config.yml                        + # # |                  Created by Jarnevan                   | # # +--------------------------------------------------------+ # ############################################################## ############################################################ # +------------------------------------------------------+ # # |                 BroadCast Messages                   | # # +------------------------------------------------------+ # ############################################################ use-broadcast: true [你选择了一个头像，然后提示的消息] Santa-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Santa Claus!' RedPresent-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Present!' Snowman-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Snowman!' GreenPresent-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Green Present!' RedWhitePresent-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Red And White Present!' Enderman-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Enderman!' Golem-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Golem!' Wither-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Wither!' Witch-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Witch!' Blaze-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Blaze!' LavaSlime-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Lava Slime!' Villager-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Villager!' Penguin-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Penguin!' Pig-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Pig!' ZombiePig-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Zombie Pigman!' Creeper-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Creeper!' Squid-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Squid!' Slime-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Slime!' Chicken-Outfit-broadcast: '&a %player% Hase been transformed in a Chicken!' AngryVillager-Outfit-broadcast: '&a%player% Hase been transformed in a Angry Villager!' Wolf-Outfit-broadcast: '&a %player% Hase been transformed in a Wolf!' Zombie-Outfit-broadcast: '&a %player% Hase been transformed in a Zombie!' Astronaut-Outfit-broadcast: '&a %player% Hase been transformed in a Astonaut!' SwagBoy-Outfit-broadcast: '&a %player% Hase been transformed in a Swag Boy!' Superman-Outfit-broadcast: '&a %player% Hase been transformed in a Superman!' SpiderMan-Outfit-broadcast: '&a %player% Hase been transformed in a SpiderMan!' TNT-Outfit-broadcast: '&a %player% Hase been transformed in a TNT!' EnderPearl-Outfit-broadcast: '&a %player% Hase been transformed in a EnderPearl!' Note-Outfit-broadcast: '&a %player% Hase been transformed in a Note!' Ghost-Outfit-broadcast: '&a %player% Hase been transformed in a Ghost!' Builder-Outfit-broadcast: '&a %player% Hase been transformed in a Builder!' ############################################################ # +------------------------------------------------------+ # # |                   Item Name/Item Join                | # # +------------------------------------------------------+ # ############################################################ OnJoinItem:     DisplayName: '&7Hello'     Lore: '&6Hello &9Hello'     Join: true     Item: CHEST     Meta: 129     Amount: 1 ############################################################ # +------------------------------------------------------+ # # |           No Permissions Messages/Options            | # # +------------------------------------------------------+ # ############################################################ Coins:[就是什么没有权限啦....没有钱购买啦提示的消息]     CoinsMessage: '&a You have now &6&l%coins% coins&a!'     GivenCoins: '&5&lYou received %int% coin(s)' Armor:     remove:         Noarmoron: '&cYou arent wearing any outfit right now'         succesfully: '&aSuccesfully Removed outfit' Options:     Prefix: '&6Outfits&a&l>> '     NoPermissionOutfit: '&4You have no Permissions to do this command'     NopermissionHead: '&4You have no Permissions to use this head'     Outfit-reloadmessage: '&4You have no Permissions to use this command!' NoPermissionItem: '&4You have no Permissions to do this command' TexturePackOnjoin:     Join: false     Message:         isdisabled: true ############################################################ # +------------------------------------------------------+ # # |                   Tittle Messages                    | # # +------------------------------------------------------+ # ############################################################ Title:   Coins:     HeadTitle: '&bYou have now %coins% Coins'     SubTitle: '&6 In your account'     PlayerHeadTitle: '&bYou received %int% Coin(s)'     PlayerSubTitle: '&6 In your account'   Santa:     HeadTitle: '&cYou have now the outfit'     SubTitle: '&4Santa &aOn'   RedPresent:     HeadTitle: '&cYou have now the outfit'     SubTitle: '&4Red Present &aOn'   GreenPresent:     HeadTitle: '&cYou have now the outfit'     SubTitle: '&2Green Present &aOn'   RedandWhite:     HeadTitle: '&cYou have now the outfit'     SubTitle: '&cYou have now the outfit'     SubTitle: '&cSuper Hero &aOn'   Spiderman:     HeadTitle: '&cYou have now the outfit'     SubTitle: '&4Spiderman &aOn'   TNT:     HeadTitle: '&cYou have now the outfit'   Ghost:     HeadTitle: '&cYou have now the outfit'     SubTitle: '&f&lGhost &aOn'   Builder:     HeadTitle: '&cYou have now the outfit'     SubTitle: '&6Builder &aOn'   Remove:     HeadTitle: '&cYou have removed'     SubTitle: '&cYour Outfit'复制代码 配置2：商店 商店： # # +--------------------------------------------------------+ # # |                        Outfit                          | # # +                    playercoins.yml                     + # # |                  Created by Jarnevan                   | # # +--------------------------------------------------------+ # JarneCraft125:[头颅ID]   coins: 55528[价格]   Astronaut: 1[数量]   AstronautHead: 1[数量]复制代码 配置3：使用权限购买 小解释： 这里的道理就是，在配置1是GUI的面板里显示的头颅，这里显示的是GUI头颅对应的使用权限出售 自己比对这配置和这里的配置就可以看懂了 头颅使用权限购买： # # +--------------------------------------------------------+ # # |                        Outfit                          | # # +                       shop.yml                         + # # |                  Created by Jarnevan                   | # # +--------------------------------------------------------+ # HeadShop:[头颅名字]   AstronautHead:     Cost: 5[价格]     Command:[执行命令]     - manuaddp %player% outfit.head.astronaut[就是给权限组]   Witch1:     Cost: 15     Command:     - manuaddp %player% outfit.head.witch1   LionHead:     Cost: 25     Command:     - manuaddp %player% outfit.head.lion 小推荐：如果觉得这个GUI面板丑，可以使用bossshop呀= =233333333333 下载地址： 能不能不做伸手党= = Outfits.jar (133.74 KB, 下载次数: 70) 2016-3-15 19:38 上传 点击文件名下载附件

replies.txt_content: 新货币加商店加头像加gui面板插件？

replies.author: kanming
replies.txt_content:
伍连军 发表于 2016-3-16 10:14
新货币加商店加头像加gui面板插件？
是自带一个经济，可以购买头颅使用权，用来装饰

kanming 发表于 2016-8-26 16:18
需要java8
就是8，查看货币的时候会报错

replies.author: 凉菀彡
replies.txt_content: 这个插件很好~服务器刚好用得上
